poem:
"Tracing the paths of a Door Knocker"

A Democrat stirs in the heartland, 
Bowman, a door knocker in Iowa's vast polite silence.
Whispered concerns dance on their lips,
Handouts and migrants cradled in their voices.
The canvas of porch chatter hangs in the air,
A patchwork of rural thought and shifting spectrum.
Yet, in every smoky dawn, there remains,
A hope for hands to grasp in shared understanding.
